dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
September 10, 2007

Dear Google DMCA,

It has come to my attention that the website http://healtharticles.tv/2007/09/04/permanent-no-more-%e2%80%93-modern-methods-for-tattoo-removal/ has stolen this article written by me under the pen name [private] from the website Constant Content.  Many attempts have been made to contact them for payment or removal to no avail.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner, its agent, or the law.

Please feel free to contact me at cynjaynes@comcast.net.  Thank you in advance for your assistance.
[private]
[private]
San Leandro, CA [private]
[private]
